name: Elemental Connections
description:
You are an Elementalist, able to merge the 4 main elements together seamlessly, to make them stronger. Fire, Water, Wind, Earth. Combine them together, matching the elements and numbers, to reach numbers higher than anyone thought possible.

If you've ever played 2048, you'll be familiar with the mechanics of the game. There is a higher level of strategy introduced by the 4 elements, limiting what tiles can be merged with others. 

This is my first ever Game Jam, and only my second finished game. I hope you all enjoy
